sys_script_fix.description:
This Fix Script is for VMware Aria Automation Plugin.
Please uncomment the code before executing this fix script.
This fix script is used to delete the datagrid macro related variables after ITSM 8.13
Warning : After running this fix script, reference of deleted variables will be removed from older RITM records. Please refer the user guide for a workaround to still see the datagrid data of older RITM records.
sys_script_fix.name: delete datagrid variables
